    public class SceneClassDescriptor
extends it.emarolab.owloop.aMORDescriptor.utility.MORConceptBase
implements it.emarolab.owloop.aMORDescriptor.MORConcept.Define, it.emarolab.owloop.aMORDescriptor.MORConcept.Sub<SceneClassDescriptor>, it.emarolab.owloop.aMORDescriptor.MORConcept.Super<SceneClassDescriptor>, it.emarolab.owloop.aMORDescriptor.MORConcept.Classify<SceneIndividualDescriptor>
    The OWLOOP Descriptor for a class representing an abstract Scene.

    This is an OWLClass Descriptor based on the OWLOOP API. It is in charge to synchronise the individuals classified in this class, as well as sub and super classes. It also implements method for ontological class definition and based on this, it computes the scene class cardinality.

    File: it.emarolab.sit.owloopDescriptor.SceneClassDescriptor
    Licence: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, 29 June 2007
    Author: Buoncompagni Luca (luca.buoncompagni@edu.unige.it)
    affiliation: EMAROLab, DIBRIS, University of Genoa.
    date: 05/06/17

      • readSemantic

        public java.util.List<it.emarolab.owloop.core.Semantic.MappingIntent> readSemantic()
        This method uses standard OWLOOP synchronisation mechanics to fill this Descriptor by taking information from the ontology. It also update the getCardinality() value based on the retrieved information.

      • getCardinality

        public int getCardinality()
        The sum of all the cardinality restriction available in the definition of this abstract scene class.
        Returns:
        the scene cardinality based on readSemantic() and writeSemantic().
